page.title: 09EDUCATION IN CHINGFORD
page.content: The schools in our area are: {Normanhurst,Chingford Senior High, {Chingford High,Heathcote High,Ching- } {ford CofE,Junior and Infants,St.Marys {Whitehall Primary,Longshaw Primary and {Waltham Forest school. We study many subjects in our schools Three important ones are maths,English and art. Normanhurst is a private(independan t) school.The others are state schools which are co-educational.Schools deal with the following age groups; Infants{5-7}Junior{7-11}Primary{5-11 High{11-14 }Senior High{14-16-18. Soon we may have schools for{11-16} year olds and sixth form colleges for those who stay on beyond 16. We have people who come to our schools nit nurses and dentists.There is a Wal tham Forest bus service which takes classes on visits of various kinds.
